takuo.name: Takuo Suzuki
takuo.title: Developer Relations
takuo.shortBio: Takuo is the lead of the Developer Relations team in Japan, Taiwan and ANZ...
takuo.bio: Takuo is the lead of the Developer Relations team in Japan, Taiwan and ANZ. He has a keen focus on Android's Material Design. He further engages in UX reviews of apps and further facilitates various design sprints.

hideyoshi.name: Hideyoshi Moriya
hideyoshi.title: Product Technical Specialist (Google Mobile Ads/Firebase)
hideyoshi.shortBio: Hideyoshi Moriya is a Product Technical Specialist (Google Mobile Ads/Firebase)...
hideyoshi.bio: Hideyoshi Moriya is a Product Technical Specialist (Google Mobile Ads/Firebase). He is going to talk about how to use Firebase Remote Config feature and utilize it to conduct A/B testing for optimizing advertisement implementations.

bok.name: Bok Thye Yeow
bok.title: Developer Relations Ecosystem Program Manager, Google APAC
bok.shortBio: Bok Thye Yeow is a Google Developer Relations Program Manager...
bok.bio: Bok Thye Yeow is a Google Developer Relations Program Manager and have more than a decade of experience developing full stack software solutions across various industries including telco, banking, digital and creative advertising, retail, etc. During his free time, he likes to experiment with new technology or taking his road bike out for a spin. He strongly believe we are only starting to scratch the surface of what's possible with technology in this era and is looking forward to the 'next big thing' to come!

taylor.name: Taylor Ling
taylor.title: UX GDE
taylor.shortBio: Taylor is a professional Mobile Product Designer and is passionate about good mobile UI/UX...
taylor.bio: Taylor is a professional Mobile Product Designer and is passionate about good mobile UI/UX. Previously he was working with a 3D printing company on their life-saving medical software before joining Snappymob, a startup in Kuala Lumpur trying to make a difference in the local mobile app development scene by creating high-quality apps that users love. Taylor also involve heavily in designing Fabulous, a habit-forming app that was selected for the Google Play Store Editor's Choice and nominated for Google Play Awards during I/O 2016.

wenjiun.name: Yap Wen Jiun
wenjiun.title: Lecturer
wenjiun.shortBio: Yap Wen Jiun is a lecturer of engineering mathematics and programming on Raspberry Pi at Multimedia University...
wenjiun.bio: Yap Wen Jiun is a lecturer of engineering mathematics and programming on Raspberry Pi at Multimedia University. In his free time he conducts research on the Internet of Things and smart home. As a Google fan boy, he started Android development since the early days of beta, became the de facto speaker for local community groups CodeAndroid Malaysia and now active with GDG Kuala Lumpur. In the past, he has given talks related to Android in several events such as BarCamps, MOSC, MyGOSSCON, TEDxMMU, DevFest and CampusG. He is currently experimenting with IoT projects with Bluetooth Low Energy.

andhie.name: Andhie Wong
andhie.title: Senior Android Developer
andhie.shortBio: Andhie is a highly experienced senior Android developer from Agmo Studio...
andhie.bio: Andhie is a highly experienced senior Android developer from Agmo Studio. A passionate and knowledgeable Android developer, Andhie has been developing numerous Android applications, both for the consumer and Android market. His apps encompass many industries, such as finance, oil & gas, and many more.

kevin.name: Kevin Tan
kevin.shortBio: Kevin has done various Android apps for a living, as well as enterprise web projects...
kevin.bio: Kevin has done various Android apps for a living, as well as enterprise web projects. He does a lot of R&D on his free time and does his best in shorten his development time and streamline processes by doing some minor automation work.

nazrul.name: Nazrul Kamaruddin
nazrul.title: Head of Technology
nazrul.shortBio: Nazrul heads the engineering team at Sparkline.com, with a mission to democratise the digital data landscape...
nazrul.bio:
Nazrul heads the engineering team at Sparkline.com, with a mission to democratise the digital data landscape and make data driven decision tools accessible to every business. He has been developing software for more than 16 years, mostly Web applications, designing API backend architecture & services and dabbles in mobile development.

The founder of Google Developer Groups (GDG) Kuala Lumpur, Nazrul has contributed his personal time in organising events & building a community of people who is interested in Google developer platforms since 2009. His biggest achievement is to organized the largest GDG Devfest Kuala Lumpur in 2013 attended by 1000 software professionals and students.

Nowadays, he contributes his time & effort to the Drupal open source software project as a developer and as an association member. He is a regular speaker at PyCon Malaysia and other tech community events globally.

He intends to travel the world with his wife & 2 really cute cats. No one gets left behind.

nazlina.name: Nazlina Quadir
nazlina.title: Lead Organiser
nazlina.shortBio: Nazlina started as an observer while tagging along her soulmate with his geeky events...
nazlina.bio:
Nazlina started as an observer while tagging along her soulmate with his geeky events. She saw the gap in gender equality and the needs to empower more Malaysian women to stand out and participate aggressively within the local tech community here in Malaysia. She then immediately took on the role to lead the Google's WomenTechmakers global program and brand for women in science, technology, engineering and mathematics (STEM) for Kuala Lumpur and organised the first Women Techmakers event in 2015.
With her strong believe that education and sharing of knowledge is equally important in nuturing the growth of the community, she continued to contribute by organising Google's I/O Extended 2015, Women Techmakers 2016 and GDG DevFest 2016.

jt.name: JT Liew
jt.title: Lead Organizer
jt.shortBio: JT is a Full Stack Developer working in TABLEAPP Sdn. Bhd. He is also a lead organiser of Google Developer Group Kuala Lumpur...
jt.bio: JT is a Full Stack Developer working in TABLEAPP Sdn. Bhd. He is also a lead organiser of Google Developer Group Kuala Lumpur. He loves to get close and make friends with experts and gurus in IT, business, and many other fields so that he can learn from them. Moreover, JT is also passionate in sharing what he learned to others, believing that through sharing we can achieve much more than we can ever imagined. As a FullStack developer working in a startup, he is skilled in Android, PHP, JavaScript, Python among other computer languages that encompass both front and backend.

henrylim.name: Henry Lim
henrylim.title: Event Organizer
henrylim.shortBio: Henry is a freelance frontend web developer and he loves to learn all the latest Google Web Developer technologies...
henrylim.bio: Henry loves to learn and implement all the latest and greatest Google Web Developer technologies. He is trying to make the web even greater with Progressive Web Apps, Polymer, AMP, Firebase and many more! He is currently part of the organizing team of Google Developer Group Kuala Lumpur. Moreover, he won the best progressive web app in Firebase Static Showdown 2016 Hackathon and he also won the Firebass Challenge!

noel.name: Noel Chew
noel.title: Android Developer
noel.shortBio: Noel Chew is an Android Developer from AIO Synergy Solutions. Coming from an Electrical and Computer Systems Engineering background...
noel.bio: Noel Chew is an Android Developer from AIO Synergy Solutions. Coming from an Electrical and Computer Systems Engineering background, he has been involved in multiple projects across a variety of features such as building security system, real estate management system, chat messaging applications, etc. He is also an active hackathon participant and has won several hackathons over the last few years. Most notably, his team won AngelHack KL 2015 and represented Malaysia to pitch in Silicon Valley.

qamra.name: Qamra Jema Khan
qamra.title: Senior Quant Analyst
qamra.shortBio: Qamra is a Senior Quant Analyst who builds pricing models and deals with stochastic calculus...
qamra.bio: Qamra is a Senior Quant Analyst who builds pricing models and deals with stochastic calculus. In her free time, she enjoys playing with Android and the newest APIs.You can find some of her published apps on the Google Play store.

jenna.name: Jenna Huey
jenna.title: Co-founder & Director
jenna.shortBio: Fintech. Founder of startup. (Used to be lawyer! ) Passionate about building a robust startup and fintech ecosystem.
jenna.bio: Fintech. Founder of startup. (Used to be lawyer! ) Passionate about building a robust startup and fintech ecosystem.

lianxun.name: Eng Lian Xun
lianxun.shortBio: Xun is regarded as a Tech Evangelist, having began his freelancing programming career at age of 16...
lianxun.bio: Xun is regarded as a Tech Evangelist, having began his freelancing programming career at age of 16, and is already an industry expert majoring in programming frameworks like NodeJs, AngularJS, Amazon Web Services, Docker, SQL, NoSQL, Swift, Objective-C, PHP and many more. A shining example of starting young and going global, Xun has amassed his experiences, consulting and developing programmes for 8 startups, from Malaysia to the Australia, United Kingdom and the United States. With his long track-record, Xun fondly recalls his most memorable contribution was to help PhD lecturers in universities in their research work while he was only in his Third Year of studies, while being offered to study PhD himself in University Malaya. Xun is passionate in teaching product development.

faez.name: Faez Murshidi bin Adnan
faez.title: Android Developer
faez.shortBio: Faez is a software engineer and a machine learning enthusiast. He's been doing Android for about two years...
faez.bio: Faez is a software engineer and a machine learning enthusiast. He's been doing Android for about two years and now currently work at Buuuk as Android dev. Apart from geeking out and watch unboxing videos of the stuff that he can't afford, He also love to explore and try new things especially that revolves around tech and do fun personal projects during my free time. Also enjoys reading news on local startup scene especially in the healthcare space. Constantly learning.

sam.name: Sam Baxendale
sam.shortBio: Sam is an experienced recruitment professional, he started his career in the industry in 2001...
sam.bio: Sam Baxendale is an experienced recruitment professional, he started his career in the industry in 2001 and has launched and led numerous new business operations across the UK and Asia. He is currently responsible for Ambition's growing Malaysia operation covering the Technology, Digital, Finance & Accounting and Banking Operations & Business Change sectors as well as Contract Services business.

vick.name: Vick Nesh
vick.title: Consultant
vick.shortBio: Vicknesh has been actively involved in penetration testing as well as forensics...
vick.bio: Vicknesh has been actively involved in penetration testing as well as forensics, software development, application security audit and network design and deployment for the past 13 years. Currently, Vicknesh is consulting for the International Telecommunications Union (ITU) in the expansion and utilisation the Digital Object Architecture (DOA). He is actively developing solutions to combat counterfeit products & IoT by applying DOA & blockchain together.
